doc.title: Its official! Singaporeans like Singapore Food!
doc.text: So/CC the/DT majority/NN of/IN Singaporeans/NNS still/RB like/IN our/PRP$ local/JJ food/NN !/. Of/IN the/DT 1320/JJ people/NN who/WP voted/VBZ ,/, the/DT majority/NNP -LRB-/NNP 68.5/NNP %/: -RRB-/DT said/JJ they/PRP still/RB prefer/VB Singapore/NN food/NN ./. What/WP was/VBD surprising/RB though/IN was/VBD how/RB popular/JJ Japanese/NN food/NN is/VBZ -LRB-/JJ 53/NN %/: -RRB-/NNP ,/, surpassing/NNP Chinese\/Cantonese/NNP Cuisine/NNP -LRB-/NNP 32.2/NNP -RRB-/NNP by/IN quite/RB a/DT significant/JJ margin/NN ./. Of/IN the/DT European/NN cuisine/NN ,/, Italian/NN cuisine/NN -LRB-/NN 13.5/NN %/: -RRB-/NNP was/VBD the/DT most/NN popular/JJ ./.
